Text:
thanks - i have it - an interesting film though of course now overshadowed by reality !

i have privilege and the war game if interested

does anyone have culloden ?
I would love to see Privilege. Can you seed it please?
Hardcoded french subs, rather fucking annoying - I wish uploader had said something, but dunno if there's even another copy around, so thanks anyway.
since this seems to be the only copy of this on the internet, ill suffer through the french subs. THANKS!

Stop moaning : you can have the film in perfect DVD quality. If you're unhappy with the subs look out for a R1 U.S. dvd release... 

What? There ain't any? So thank the French for having the guts to preserve this one ;-)

Maybe this version doesn't have the hardcoded subs: www dot torrenthound dot com/hash/42eea2267011cf331446a58cd6b863fc341b951d/torrent-info/Punishment-Park-1971-USA-Peter-Watkins-DVDrip-XviD-0

Gonna try it and I'll let you know if it doesn't.
